project_descr: Capacity Building  and Demonstration  for   Electrification  of Hinterland  Unserved Areas , Utilising Renewable Energy

outputs.output_descr:
This project is expected to play a supportive and catalytic role and complement the ongoing projects and activities of various donors, private sector and the government. Focus will be on partnerships, networking, collaborating, national ownership and community participation by providing technical assistance, institutional strengthening and capacity building through the implementation of three or more hinterland demonstration projects on renewable energy.

The project will promote linkages to sustainable livelihoods development activities and other development activities such as micro-enterprise development and the establishment of a small revolving fund to peanut farmers. By promoting development in hinterland locations, it will facilitate the expansion and creation of economic opportunities of residents and the diversification of the community.
